content.rendered:
XYO Price Prediction 2020

The current project model covers a wide range of different industries, including medical services, e-commerce, car rental agencies and many, many more.

To see how far the XYO coin price can go, we’ve collected several the most perspective XYO price predictions:

CoinCheckup XYO Price Prediction

Сryptocurrency research platform CoinCheku forecasts that if XYO has near 20% of Bitcoin’s previous average growth per year, the XYO coin may reach up to $0.0005 in 2020 and by 2023, XYO may reach the $0.0017 mark.

TradingBeats XYO Price Prediction

Analytical website TradingBeats predicts that XYO will reach $0.0003758 by the beginning of June 2020. The expected maximum price is at the $0.0004799 level, while the minimum price mark is at the $0.0003263 level.

CoinPredictor XYO Price Prediction

Cryptocurrency-focused prediction service CoinPredictor states the experts are not encouraging new traders to invest in XYO coin because “it has a bearish trend.”

“XYO forecast does not show much of positive signs to see this coin thriving on the exchange,” the service added.

CoinSwitch XYO Price Prediction

A cryptocurrency exchange aggregator platform CoinSwitch claims XYO is about to go “through a lot of changes and updates.” CoinSwitch expects the coin to reach at least $0.004808 by the end of 2019 and $0.009616 by the end of 2020.

WalletInvestor XYO Price Prediction

Analytical website WalletInvestors which provides the present market situation awaits XYO to reach at least $0.000514 by 2020. However, according to present data, XYO has been in the bearish market over the last 12 months. In the foreseeable future, WalletInvestor expects XYO to be, in general, in a negative trend.

XYO Price Prediction Verdict

Regardless of the fact that the project already has more than one million global devices, it suffers a lack of adoption in the cryptocurrency industry. Currently, the XYO coin is listed only on three exchanges and only one of them has almost 99% of circulation. The coin still has to prove itself as a competitive project in this highly-cramped industry.

What is XYO?

XYO (XYO) is based on a distributed ledger technology network of physical devices. The main goal of the network is to store and verify all geo-related data of objects from the real world. In other words, XYO is like a blockchain version of the Internet of Things system.

According to CoinMarketCap, the XYO coin is on the five hundred eighty-sixth place in the top 1000 cryptocurrencies in the world by market cap.

The daily trading volume of the coin is approximately $2,300 USD or 0,3 Bitcoins (BTC). 

The two main features of this coin are that the coin was launched after the so-called “the crypto winter” and it succeeded to reach its all-time-high (ATH) in December 2018.

The current XYO price is at $0,000313 USD (or 0,00000004 BTC) per 1 XYO. The total supply of XYO is equal to 14 198 847 000 coins.

You can store and exchange the XYO in Atomic Wallet, a secure decentralized crypto wallet not only for traditional assets like Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP) but also for the other 500+ tokens.

XYO Blockchain

The XYO Network project was founded back in 2010 and it gives anyone a tool to access location-based technologies that connect the digital world to the physical world with the help of crypto algorithms. The network can interact with any smart contract-supported open blockchain network just like Ethereum, EOS, NEO, Stellar, Cardano and so on.

The XYO Network smart contract platform is using the Ethereum blockchain and yes, XYO is ERC-20 type coin.

XYO Price Chart

The XYO’s ICO ended on May 20, 2018, and raised $12 million. As for now, the coin is doing just like the rest of the whole cryptocurrency industry. In other words, the XYO coin is pretty far from its ATH (approx. -1560%) but still shows signs of recovery.

How to buy XYO

At the time of writing, XYO is not possible to buy directly via a Simplex payment processor. However, you can simply purchase  Bitcoin or Ethereum, for example, with the help of a credit card and after that — exchange any of these cryptocurrencies for XYO. 

First of all, download the app and pass the verification process (photo ID is obligatory to confirm your identity) to start hodling today.

How to exchange XYO

The XYO coin can easily be swapped through a native exchange that is integrated into the Atomic Wallet. The wallet supports 300+ ERC20-based tokens and other prominent cryptocurrencies like Dogecoin (DOGE), Litecoin (LTC), Ethereum (ETH) and many more.
